title: The Death Row Inmate and the Demon
surface: A death row inmate met a demon and made a wish. The demon helped him. A few days later, pedestrians on the street were holding their noses and looking disgusted.
bottom: The demon turned the inmate invisible, allowing him to successfully escape prison. However, he was hit and killed by a car on the road. A few days later, his body began to rot and stink, which was unbearable for the passersby.
tips: The inmate's wish was about not being seen.
He successfully escaped from prison.
The wish granted by the demon led to his death.
He died in a traffic accident.
His body was left on the road.
The body was only noticed days later due to the smell of decay.
His invisibility was the cause of the accident.

title: The Girl Who Jumped
surface: A college girl was working part-time during her vacation and not living at home. One night, she heard a noise and the sound of a door opening downstairs, so she immediately hid under the bed. The next day, she was found dead under the bed. Please deduce.
bottom: A girl had previously jumped to her death from the dormitory building. That day happened to be the seventh day after her death, and she returned to find a replacement. Since the girl died by jumping, her ghost maintained an upside-down posture. When she entered the room, she came face-to-face with the girl hiding under the bed, who died of fright.
tips: The girl died of extreme fright.
Someone had recently committed suicide by jumping from the dormitory building.
The event occurred on the 'seventh day' after the death, a significant day in some traditions.
The noise was made by the ghost of the girl who jumped.
The ghost maintained the posture it had at the time of death.
The ghost's posture was head-down, feet-up.
The girl hiding under the bed saw the ghost's face.
The ghost entered the room upside down.

title: The Restroom
surface: A woman went to the restroom. Inside, she saw 'Don't look left' written on the stall door. She looked left and saw 'Don't look down' written on the wall. She looked down and saw 'Don't look behind you, there's a ghost' written on the floor. She looked behind her and saw nothing. After using the toilet, she went to wash her hands and suddenly felt a chill down her spine. Please deduce.
bottom: The woman suddenly realized that 'Don't look behind you, there's a ghost' written on the floor didn't refer to what was behind her, but what was above her head.
tips: The writing in the restroom was intentionally misleading about direction.
The position of the phrase 'there's a ghost behind you' is crucial.
This phrase was written on the floor of the stall.
'Behind' did not refer to her back.
The real danger was above her head.
The woman only figured out the location of the danger while washing her hands.
There was indeed a 'ghost' in the restroom stall.

title: Midnight Train
surface: Five minutes to midnight, a man boarded a train, but his expression was strange. He looked at the few people on the train and began to ask their ages. 'Ma'am, are you 28 this year?' 'How did you know?' 'Sir, are you 55?' 'Yes.' The man correctly guessed everyone's age one by one. 'Grandma, are you 69 this year?' 'Not yet, but in 5 minutes I will be 69.' After hearing this, the man's face turned pale.
bottom: The man can see people's date of death! The old woman will die when she turns 69! This means that in 5 minutes, the train will crash, and everyone on board will die.
tips: The man has the ability to foresee the date of death.
The 'age' he sees is actually the age of death.
The old woman will die in five minutes.
The old woman's death is not from natural causes.
The train is about to have a fatal accident.
Everyone on the train will die in five minutes.
The man's face turned pale because he foresaw his own death.

title: Midnight Visitor
surface: One in the morning, that damn doorbell rang again. She's here, to kill me. I knew it, she wouldn't let me go. The police arrested me, saying I have schizophrenia. I remember now, it was me, I almost killed my wife. But why is the doorbell ringing again?
bottom: The man's wife died, and the police suspected him of murder. But the man had schizophrenia, so to make him remember, they pretended to be the woman who committed the murder. Under the police's constant stimulation, the man remembered: he did have schizophrenia and had indeed almost killed his wife. He was taken to a mental hospital. That night, however, the doorbell rang again, and a woman was really standing outside.
tips: The protagonist suffers from schizophrenia.
The previous doorbell rings were arranged by the police.
The police's goal was to make him recall the incident.
The protagonist did indeed harm his wife.
The protagonist was later sent to a mental hospital.
The last doorbell ring was real.
There was really a woman outside the door at the end.
A real threat exists, independent of the protagonist's mental issues.

title: The Cat
surface: She got a new boyfriend who had a cat. To her annoyance, the cat, which was always docile and quiet with her boyfriend, would always hiss and bare its teeth at her, and had even bitten her several times. She couldn't take it anymore and secretly abandoned the cat. Her boyfriend smiled.
bottom: The cat would always let out piercing screams at her, and would even climb onto her bed at night, its green eyes staring at her without blinking. There it was again, that indescribable feeling. She knew it must be the cat watching her. Later, after the cat was gone, she discovered that the one watching her was her boyfriend. A few months passed. She crouched by the new mistress's bed, quietly watching her.
tips: The cat's hostility was not normal animal behavior.
The boyfriend's reaction to the cat being abandoned was suspicious.
The feeling of being watched did not come from the cat.
The real watcher was the boyfriend.
The protagonist's identity has changed.
The protagonist has become something like a cat.
She is now watching someone else.
This is a story about identity replacement or a cycle.

title: The Slide
surface: Near programmer Wang's home, there is a park. Every day when Wang passed the park on his way home from working overtime, he would see a child in a plaid shirt standing by the slide with a terrified look. One day, Wang didn't work overtime and, on a whim, went down the slide. After sliding down, Wang was horrified. What did he see?
bottom: It turned out Wang saw himself on his way home from work. The slide was a time machine. When Wang slid down, he turned into the child. The child's plaid shirt was actually programmer Wang's. The terrified child he saw every time was himself after sliding down.
tips: The slide has an unnatural function.
The slide is related to time.
The terrified child seen every day is the same person.
The child's plaid shirt is related to Wang.
After sliding down, Wang saw himself.
Sliding down caused a change in age.
The child was the younger version of Wang himself.

title: Lele
surface: I suspect Lele in our class likes me. She is usually taciturn and doesn't like to communicate with classmates, gradually becoming an invisible person, and even the teacher forgets her existence. But such an invisible person has recently been staring at me and keeps opening her mouth to me...
bottom: Lele can see ghosts and use her voice to dispel them, thus becoming taciturn. Lele saw a ghost on me and helped me dispel it. Staring at me every day is actually looking at the ghost beside me. (The sound Lele makes cannot be heard by normal people)
tips: Lele has the ability to see ghosts
Her voice can dispel ghosts
Lele's taciturnity has a reason
She is staring at the ghost beside me
Opening her mouth is using the ghost-dispelling ability
Her ghost-dispelling voice cannot be heard by people

title: Potion
surface: Grandma gave me a bottle of potion, and I lost my beloved boy.
bottom: I begged Grandma for a magical potion. As long as the person I love drinks it, that person will always love me. The boy I loved drank it, but the next day he was found dead in a cemetery. It turned out that the potion needed the hair of the person as a引子 (ingredient), and I was wearing a wig at that time. The owner of the wig was a woman who had just died. No wonder I didn't feel anything when Grandma plucked my hair.
tips: The potion requires the person's own hair
I was wearing a wig at that time
The wig belonged to a dead woman
The boy fell in love with the original owner of the wig
The boy finally died in the cemetery

title: How Many Steps
surface: 'First step, second step, third step...' I went crazy after counting.
bottom: There is a rumor that the teaching building of our school is haunted at night, but I didn't believe it. So after evening self-study, when everyone left, I secretly stayed alone. But I found nothing and thought there was really no ghost. When going downstairs, I casually counted the number of steps, 'One step, two steps, three steps...' After counting, I suddenly remembered that my classroom is on the first floor, and there should be no stairs at all...
tips: Counting stairs in the teaching building at night
The protagonist stays at school alone
The protagonist doesn't believe in school ghosts
The protagonist's classroom is on the first floor
There shouldn't be stairs on the first floor
Going insane after counting the steps

title: Strange New Home
surface: I moved to a new home. In the new home, I placed the desk by the window, but whenever I sit at the desk and concentrate on work, there is always an inexplicable strange feeling.
bottom: I moved to a new home and placed a desk by the window for work. But soon after moving in, whenever I worked seriously at the desk, I felt something gently brush my neck. At first, I thought I was just nervous and didn't care. But over time, this feeling persisted. As long as I sat at the desk, I felt something keep touching my neck, but when I left the desk, it disappeared. So I found a master, who said that some invisible things can be captured by old cameras and asked me to take a photo immediately when I felt the touch again. I went home, set up the camera, sat at the desk, and when I felt something touch my neck, I pressed the shutter. Then I took the photo to the photo studio to develop it. When I got the photo, I was so scared that my face turned white. Behind me, there were a pair of feet hanging in the air. It turned out that what I had been feeling was the feet of the previous resident who hanged himself by the window, swinging and touching my neck.
tips: Strange feelings beside the desk in the new home
Neck is always touched by something
The master suggests confirming with a photo
The photo shows hanging feet
The previous resident hanged himself by the window
It is the ghost's swinging feet that touch the neck

title: Red Clothes
surface: 'Do you want red clothes?',' Why is that salesman here again? I can't stand it anymore. How many red clothes do you have? I'll take them all. Stop bothering me!',' The next day, no one in the dormitory got up'.
bottom: I am a college student. At night, a woman in red often comes to sell door-to-door late at night, knocking on each room every night. If someone opens the door, she asks, 'Do you want red clothes?'. In the previous nights, I was very angry after being disturbed and shouted 'No'. One night, the woman came again. I finally couldn't bear it and yelled at her, 'How many red clothes do you have? I'll take them all. Stop bothering me!' I only heard the woman chuckle, turned around, and left without giving me red clothes. That night, everyone slept well, and no one came to knock on the door again. The next day, no one got up. When the dorm supervisor checked the dormitory and lifted the quilt, it was found that the skin on the upper body of me and my roommates had been peeled off, looking like wearing a red dress.
tips: Red-clothed woman knocks on the door to sell at night
Red clothes have a terrifying meaning
The protagonist angrily accepts the invitation
An angry word招致 (causes) a terrifying disaster
Roommates are all skinned and made into red clothes

title: Room
surface: Husband went to that room again. Why won't he let me go! 'Don't leave me.' He murmured in his dream. It turns out he really loves me very much.
bottom: Due to an accident, I passed away. But because I missed my husband, my soul still returned home as usual. After returning home, I found that my husband's behavior had become very strange and he kept不让 (not letting) me enter the study. I didn't think carefully. But when sleeping at night, he actually shed tears and murmured, 'Don't leave me.'I suspected he had changed his heart and decided to find out everything. So I pushed open that room and found my own portrait inside.
tips: The narrator is actually a ghost
She doesn't know she has passed away
Husband doesn't let her enter the study
The room has her portrait
Husband's dream words are due to sadness

title: Daughter's Words
surface: Wife fell from the mountain. Daughter said a word, and he went crazy.
bottom: The man took his wife to climb the mountain and pushed her off the peak. Later, the man remarried and had a daughter. A few years later, when he took his daughter to climb the mountain, the daughter said to him, 'Don't push me down this time.'
tips: The husband is the real murderer who killed his ex-wife
The daughter has memories that shouldn't exist
The daughter's words hint at past life experiences
The mountain climbing scene triggers terrible memories
The father collapses mentally due to the daughter's words

title: Son
surface: The son committed suicide and left a note. The mother went crazy after reading the note.
bottom: After marrying a wealthy businessman, the woman killed the wealthy businessman's original son in an accident for property. Later, she gave birth to her own son, but the son committed suicide after learning that the woman was pregnant again. The note said: You killed me, so I will make you give birth to me repeatedly and lose me again.
tips: The mother once killed her stepson for property
The suicidal son is the reincarnation of the stepson
The son commits suicide after learning the mother is pregnant again
The content of the suicide note is a curse of revenge
The mother goes crazy after seeing the suicide note

title: Yin-Yang Eyes
surface: I am a person with yin-yang eyes and can see ghosts around me. One day, my yin-yang eyes suddenly disappeared. It wasn't until I met him again that I understood what happened.
bottom: He is someone who knows I have yin-yang eyes. One day, he killed me and took my eyes. And I became a ghost留在 (staying) in the world. But I didn't remember what happened during that time. I just thought I was still alive. Because as before, I could see ghosts around me. Until one day I met him again and saw his eyes. Suddenly, I remembered everything.
tips: The ability of yin-yang eyes suddenly disappeared
The protagonist has actually been killed by him
The yin-yang eyes were taken by the murderer
The protagonist becomes a ghost without realizing it
Seeing the murderer's eyes restores memories

title: Wishing
surface: I made a wish on a crystal ball. The wish came true. I died.
bottom: I wished upon a crystal ball to remain young forever. But the crystal ball misunderstood my meaning. The wish was granted; I died, so my youth would be frozen at the moment of my death.
tips: The wish was to remain young forever
The crystal ball granted the wish literally
Eternal youth was achieved by being frozen at the moment of death
Death was the direct result of the wish

title: Final Exam
surface: This month after transferring, all my classmates thought I was mentally unstable and ostracized me. Only the teacher didn't think so, but after the final exam results came out, I realized I really wasn't normal...
bottom: I was born with yin-yang eyes (the ability to see ghosts), but I didn't know it myself. I had just transferred schools, and only my deskmate was particularly friendly to me. Other classmates thought I was mentally unstable and ostracized me. It wasn't until I called out my deskmate's name in class one day that the teacher realized with horror that I wasn't mentally ill. It turned out that the friendly deskmate was not human at all; he was a student who had died at this school many years ago. Other classmates couldn't see him. The teacher had heard about this when she first started teaching at the school, coupled with occasional paranormal events in the teaching building. Therefore, she knew the truth, but didn't dare to discuss it with me. It wasn't until the final exam results were released that I noticed my deskmate's name wasn't on the list. Combined with my classmates' previous attitudes towards me, I finally realized that I was indeed different from normal people...
tips: The narrator has the ability to see non-human entities (yin-yang eyes)
Other classmates cannot see or perceive this deskmate
The teacher knows the deskmate's true identity (ghost) and background
The teacher knew about the school's paranormal legends but dared not tell me
The final exam results list only includes living students
The deskmate's name not appearing on the report card confirmed the abnormality of my perceptions

title: Building Elevator
surface: "Things have been so unlucky lately; I have to do all the work, and I even caught a cold." I thought, as I pressed the elevator button. The elevator doors slowly opened, and the sight inside scared me so much I turned and ran.
bottom:
People have been disappearing in the building where I work recently, causing widespread panic, but I'm forced to continue working overtime to make a living, even going to work with a cold. Thinking about all this, I felt unlucky. Today, I was wearing a mask, ready to take the elevator down after work, but when the elevator doors opened, before me was a grotesque wall of flesh, wriggling internal organs, and sharp teeth. I was so terrified I turned and ran.
This was a monster disguised as an elevator, which spread a pollen-like substance to induce hallucinations, making people believe the elevator was normal. Because I had a cold and wore a mask, I was not affected by the illusion.
tips: I wore a mask due to a cold, blocking hallucinations (I was unaffected by the illusion)
People were missing in the building, but I continued to work due to livelihood
The elevator was a living organism
The elevator spread illusions through pollen, making it appear normal
Witnessing the elevator's internal biological structure scared me away

title: Wish (Repeated)
surface: "As you can see, I am a genie in a bottle. Since you found me, I can grant you three wishes." "Alright, all three wishes have been granted, and I must leave. But you probably don't remember, do you? You made this last wish before."
bottom: He suffered from amnesia and knew nothing of his past life. One day, he found a bottle with a genie. The genie said it could grant him three wishes, so he wished to know his past. However, his past was very tragic. After learning it, he was in great pain and wished to forget everything again. Completely unaware, he picked up the bottle with the genie again and made the wish, "I want to know my past," and has lived in pain ever since.
tips: Wished to know past life
Learning the past caused pain
Wanted to forget due to extreme pain
Genie hinted at a repetitive wish
The wishes form a loop

title: Bottle by the Sea
surface: I was walking home. The sea breeze gently blew, and I watched the bottle sink into the seabed, feeling as if I had forgotten something. The sky also seemed noticeably darker than before... Oh well, I should just hurry home.
bottom: I am a materialist. One day, on my way home, I picked up a bottle washed ashore by the waves. From the bottle flew out a mysterious creature that called itself a genie and claimed it could grant wishes. Such a huge creature coming from such a small bottle, able to speak, and claiming to grant wishes—this contradicted my understanding of the world. So, I wished to forget everything about the bottle and for the bottle to return to the sea. The wish was granted, and I forgot everything about the bottle.
tips: I am a materialist
Materialist encounters a genie
Encountering the genie caused a cognitive conflict
Cognitive conflict led to making a wish
The wish resulted in forgetting

title: Return Home
surface: On the rural road, the passing residents stared at me. I disdained the rural customs, avoiding the procession. After returning home, there was no familiar sound, and I knew something was wrong.
bottom: I am the owner of a chemical factory. I built a factory in my hometown, polluting the local land. The locals believed in the land and nature; when the chemical plant was built, they agreed because they didn't understand and thought it was profitable, but later the land gradually deteriorated, so they harbored hatred towards me. Also, there was a custom of hanging wind chimes at every doorstep to attract souls and protect the home, and the incessant tinkling of countless wind chimes in the wind irritated me. When I returned home, I didn't hear the familiar sound of wind chimes. The villagers had removed the wind chimes as revenge, which led to my parents being killed by invading spirits, and the procession I saw on the road was actually my parents' funeral procession. I also won't live much longer.
tips: Missing wind chime sounds are a key anomaly
Villagers removed wind chimes as an act of revenge
Factory pollution led to villagers' hatred
The passing procession was for the parents' funeral
The staring was due to the villagers' hatred

title: Car Accident
surface: Mom and Dad went on a trip. Dad came back alone. He said Mom couldn't come back. I looked down at the message. I knew this was the last time I'd see him.
bottom: Mom and Dad went on a trip. That day, Dad returned early. He sadly told me there had been a car accident on the way, and Mom had passed away. I couldn't accept it, but the next second, I received a message from Mom. They had a car accident in another city, and Dad died from his injuries despite rescue efforts. In an instant, I understood: it was Dad who had died, because the scene was crowded and his soul hadn't witnessed his own death. Due to excessive grief, he also didn't realize how a normal person could return to me in an instant from another city; this was the last time I would see him.
tips: Conflicting information about parents' deaths
Father's instant return home is illogical
Mother's message reveals the truth
Father's soul did not realize he was dead
Last meeting implies father is not alive

title: Yin-Yang
surface: The child cried, the parents comforted. The car stopped, returned to its original spot, and the parents both laughed and cried.
bottom: The child possessed yin-yang eyes, able to see unclean things. From the moment they passed a certain spot, the child kept crying. The parents frantically tried to comfort them, but to no avail, so they had to ask the driver to stop the car. The child led the parents to a safe place. Finally, when the three returned to the original spot, they found that everyone in the car was dead. It turned out the child had seen a vengeful spirit that killed everyone else in the car, and the parents, thanks to the child's yin-yang eyes, escaped death. They laughed at their survival and cried for everyone else in the car who had died.
tips: The child possesses yin-yang eyes
Crying is a signal to avoid danger
Getting out of the car led to survival
Everyone else in the car died
Both laughing and crying stem from survival and tragedy

title: Cry for Help
surface: There were cries in the abandoned hospital. I saw someone asking for help. After urinating, I calmly went home. The next day, I died, my expression ferocious.
bottom:
I am a paranormal investigator streamer. I heard that in the nearby abandoned hospital, on every full moon night, miserable cries can be heard from the second floor. To entertain my fans, I decided to investigate tonight, on the full moon night.
When I followed the cries into that hospital room, I saw a mirror. But what was reflected in the mirror was not me, but a person in a hospital gown, pale-faced, asking me for help. He was the rumored person trapped here, who underwent erroneous psychiatric treatment and eventually chose to commit suicide! So it was all true! I was so scared I peed on the spot, dropped the live streaming equipment on the floor, and ran out frantically. But that ghost chased closely after me, not letting go; he ran extremely fast. I shouted loudly in the dead of night: Help! Help! But no one heard my voice at all. That thing quickly caught up to me, controlled my body, and eerily yet calmly manipulated me to walk home. Back to my room, using the way he had died, it manipulated my body to commit suicide by slitting my wrists.
tips: The incident took place in an abandoned hospital rumored to be haunted.
The protagonist saw someone asking for help in the mirror, whose image was not their own.
The protagonist fled the hospital due to extreme fear.
The ghost from the mirror chased and controlled the protagonist.
The protagonist's final manner of death is related to the ghost's past experiences.

title: Looking Back
surface: The driver's phone rang, he argued with the driver, and I died.
bottom: I was sitting in a taxi. The person on the other end of the driver's call said that on the road ahead, a driver and a passenger had an argument and drove into a lake. The driver wanted to go to the accident scene, but I just wanted to go home, so I argued with the driver. During the argument, the driver's steering wheel spun, and we plunged into the lake. Afterwards, my ghost stood on the road watching. It turned out that the people who died at the accident scene were us; we had actually fallen into the lake and died long ago...
tips: The content of the call the driver received was related to a traffic accident.
The accident described in the call was very similar to the narrator's and the driver's situation.
The narrator and the driver argued over the destination.
There is a temporal or reality perception displacement in the story.
The narrator is already dead while telling this story.

title: Finger
surface: Dad discovered his son had a bad habit: he often pointed his finger at people. Today was as usual. When Dad turned on the TV, he found his son constantly pointing at the TV. After turning it on, a famous public figure appeared. Could this guy also...? No, that's not right...
bottom: Dad discovered his son had a bad habit: he often pointed his finger at people, even at figures in photos or videos. Dad had only recently discovered that anyone his son pointed at would inevitably die within 3 days. Today was as usual. When Dad turned on the TV, he found his son constantly pointing at the TV. After turning it on, a famous public figure appeared. This guy will die too... No... that's not right. The son was pointing at the person reflected on the screen before the TV was turned on... Isn't that himself?
tips: People the son points his finger at will die within a short time.
When the son pointed at the TV this time, the TV screen was off.
A turned-off TV screen can reflect people's images like a mirror.
Dad initially misunderstood what his son was pointing at.
What the son's finger was truly pointing at was Dad himself, reflected on the screen.

title: Rude Colleague
surface: Last night, I drank too much and took a taxi home. Today, I went to work as usual. Strange? Is the time clock broken? My colleagues are so rude; they don't even respond when I greet them.
bottom: I am a 23-year-old girl. Last night, at our company team-building event, I drank too much. I originally wanted to take a taxi home, but one of my male colleagues offered to drive me. Dazedly, I agreed and got into his car. He drove to an increasingly dark and deserted suburban area and sexually assaulted me. I tried my best to resist, but I wasn't strong enough... Finally, I said, 'I'll remember you, and I'm going to the police tomorrow!' This sentence enraged him. He killed me directly and dumped my body in the wilderness. But when I died, I was so drunk that I couldn't remember what happened, not even that I was dead. My soul thought I wasn't dead and went to work as usual, but found I couldn't touch the time clock, and when I greeted my colleagues, they couldn't see me.
tips: The person who drove the narrator home was not a taxi driver, but her male colleague.
The narrator cannot interact with any physical objects at the company.
The narrator's experience last night involved a serious violent incident.
The narrator has lost her memory of the fatal event that occurred last night.
The narrator's current state is not being alive.

title: Wish
surface: 'It hurts, it hurts so much, am I going to die? Has your wish come true? Come back quickly, woo woo...'
bottom: Grandma was critically ill. Mom and Dad took me back to the countryside to see Grandma, whom I hadn't seen in a long time. Seeing her emaciated body lying on the bed, hooked up to many tubes, I was a bit scared. Grandma told me she had an unfulfilled wish and asked me to swap bodies with her, promising she would come back. Grandma said a childhood friend she liked was about to pass away, and her wish was to see her childhood friend again. I thought of my own good friends and reluctantly agreed. I lay on the bed and exchanged a glance with the departing little girl; her eyes looked very complicated. It's been a long time, it hurts so much, I've been waiting for her to come back. Finally, at the very last moment before dying, the little girl came back. She looked down at me and said, 'Sorry, Grandma has many wishes to fulfill.'
tips: The narrator and her grandmother swapped bodies.
This body swap was proposed by the grandmother with a false promise (claiming she would swap back).
The narrator is enduring the intense pain from the grandmother's dying body.
The grandmother had no intention of swapping bodies back.
The grandmother's true wish was to use her grandchild's healthy body to continue living.

title: Selfish One
surface: The drunkard abandoned Selfish One. None of my sheep died. I put candy and its tail in its mouth. Seven years later, I met him with golden eyebrows. 'This little selfish one, unexpectedly...' I smiled
bottom:
A drunkard abandoned his dog, and I picked it up and raised it. Because it loved candy and was very protective of its food, I named it 'Selfish One.' Selfish One was a Shiba Inu with golden eyebrows. It didn't like sheep, but unfortunately, I had many sheep at home. Once, wolves came. To protect the sheep I loved, Selfish One fought with the wolf pack and eventually died tragically, while my sheep remained unharmed.
There's a prairie legend that if you put a dead dog's tail in its mouth, it will be reincarnated as a human in the next life. I wanted to try it. In addition, I also put its favorite candy in Selfish One's mouth. Seven years later, I happened to meet a little boy with golden eyebrows. He smiled at me and gave me candy. His mother said in surprise from the side, 'This little selfish one, he's actually willing to give you his favorite candy!' I smiled; it seemed like I had reunited with my precious one.
tips: 'Selfish One' is the name of the dog raised by the narrator.
This dog died fighting wolves to protect the narrator's flock of sheep.
According to local legend, putting things in a dead dog's mouth is to allow it to be reincarnated as a human.
The boy encountered seven years later has the dog's previous physical features (golden eyebrows).
The boy's nickname and his act of sharing candy are consistent with the dog's previous characteristics.

title: Briefcase
surface: Her husband went on a business trip out of town, but his briefcase was left at home. After receiving her husband's call for help, the wife sat down and turned on the TV.
bottom: The wife turned on 'The Ring'. After Sadako crawled out, she discussed with Sadako, 'Since you crawl in and out of the TV, could you help me deliver a bag?' Sadako: 'Are you sure? Okay, I'll help you deliver it just this once.'
tips: The wife intends to deliver the briefcase to her husband through an unrealistic method.
The content of the TV show or movie is key to solving the problem.
The solution involves a character or entity from the TV screen.
This character or entity has the ability to come out of the TV.
The wife communicated and negotiated with this character from the TV.
